title: Shattered Relics League/Tasks/Slayer
content:
Name Task Requirements Comp%
Beginner
Receive a Slayer Task Receive a slayer task from any Slayer Master. N/A 79%
Easy
Receive a Konar Slayer Task Have a slayer task assigned by Konar. 75 Combat level, or 99 Slayer and Slayer cape 47%
Earn Some Slayer Points Earn some slayer points by completing a Slayer Task. 20 Combat level 61%
Check Your Slayer Task Use an Enchanted Gem to check your Slayer Task. N/A 74%
Equip a Spiny Helmet Equip a Spiny Helmet. 5 Defence 65%
Receive a Slayer Task From Vannaka Receive a Slayer task from Vannaka in Edgeville Dungeon. 40 Combat level, or 99 Slayer and Slayer cape 61%
Defeat a Cockatrice in the Fremennik Province Defeat a cockatrice in the Fremennik Province. 25 Slayer 43%
Defeat a Pyrefiend in the Fremennik Province Defeat a pyrefiend in the Fremennik Province. 30 Slayer 44%
Receive a Slayer Task From Turael or Spria Receive a Slayer task From Turael in Burthorpe or Spria in Draynor Village. 1 Slayer and 3 Combat level 71%
Receive a Slayer Task From Mazchna Receive a Slayer task from Mazchna in Canifis. 20 Combat level, or 99 Slayer and Slayer cape 55%
Medium
Unlock Bigger and Badder Purchase the Bigger and Badder unlock from the Slayer Rewards Shop. N/A 44%
Slay 250 Creatures Slay 250 creatures whilst on a Slayer Task. N/A 60%
Defeat a Superior Slayer Creature Defeat any Superior Slayer Creature. 5 Slayer 41%
Defeat a Fossil Island Wyvern Defeat any type of Wyvern on Fossil Island. 66 Slayer
Bone Voyage 		23%
Defeat a Wall Beast Defeat a Wall Beast in the Lumbridge Swamp Caves. 35 Slayer
5 Defence to equip spiny helmet. 		38%

Defeat a Fire Giant in Kandarin Defeat a fire giant in Kandarin. N/A 39%
Defeat a Skeletal Wyvern Defeat a Skeletal Wyvern in the Asgarnian Ice Dungeon. 72 Slayer
Must use an elemental shield, mind shield, dragonfire shield, dragonfire ward, ancient wyvern shield to kill. 		22%
Assemble a Slayer Helm Assemble a Slayer Helm. 55 Crafting
400 Slayer points 		37%

Defeat a Drake Defeat a Drake in the Karuulm Slayer Dungeon. 84 Slayer 17%
Elite

50 Alchemical Hydra Kills Kill the Alchemical Hydra in Mount Karuulm 50 times. 95 Slayer 13%

Defeat the Abyssal Sire 500 Times Defeat the Abyssal Sire in the Abyssal Nexus 500 times. 85 Slayer <0.1%
Defeat a Smoke Devil Defeat a smoke devil in the Smoke Devil Dungeon. 93 Slayer
Requires a slayer task to attack. 		22%
Defeat the Thermonuclear Smoke Devil Defeat the thermonuclear smoke devil in the Smoke Devil Dungeon. 93 Slayer
Can be killed once without a slayer task. 		20%
Defeat Cerberus Defeat Cerberus in the Taverley Dungeon. 91 Slayer 18%
Defeat Cerberus Before She Summons Souls Defeat Cerberus before she summons souls. 91 Slayer 17%
Defeat the Grotesque Guardians 250 Times Defeat the Grotesque Guardians at the Slayer Tower 250 times. 75 Slayer 0.7%
Defeat a Hydra Defeat a Hydra in the Karuulm Slayer Dungeon. 95 Slayer 16%
500 Alchemical Hydra Kills Kill the Alchemical Hydra in Mount Karuulm 500 times. 95 Slayer 1.7%
